website_summaries.verdict: An outstanding pair of grooming gloves built for multi-functional use on various animals.
pros: Rubber nodules attack dust and mud as well as unwanted hair
Customers claimed their pets loved getting groomed by this gentle product
Distributes oils to give your pet healthy skin and coat
The collected fur can be easily removed from the gloves simply by rubbing hands together
cons: The gloves do not de-shed hair as thoroughly as some other products

customer_reviews.title: It’s a ‘Get It!’ for all animal owners, even cats.
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs, a Boxer with the typical short, tight coat; and an Australian Shepherd with a long coat and dense undercoat. I have used these gloves on both dogs with great succcess. Aussies typically ‘blow their coat’ twice a year and it looks like a snow storm! He is beginning that process now and I am very happy with the results. These gloves are comfortable to wear, work well on different kinds of animal coats, and both dogs loved the massage.
customer_reviews.author: Dusti

customer_reviews.title: Not suited for cats or dogs
customer_reviews.text: The plastic used to remove pet hair is not flexible nor are the nubs to grab the hair. The nubbs to grab the hair should be rubberized, not hard plastic. It's like grooming your pet with a Tupperware lid. Returned mine and looking for another product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancey Hoday

customer_reviews.title: I could not believe how great these gloves work! NOT!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Started falling apart after 4th use. Material is separating from silicone nobs on the fingers. It could be because they are so tight that you have to pull quite hard to get them off. My advice... Do not buy!! I could not believe how great these gloves work! i saw the video and thought: "No Way"! But the work exactly as shown. Gets the hair out and shakes the hair right off! Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for cats.
customer_reviews.text: This may work quite well for larger (or even smaller) animals, but don't try it on cats, especially if they still have claws. The nylon backing will catch those claws and keep them caught, and will tear easily. Plus hair flies everywhere, fast. Not so easy to get the hair that does stay on the gloves, either. The material doesn't seem to be much better than that used for the far cheaper gloves also produced in China... Sorry, but did not work for us.
customer_reviews.author: alan a

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about this item, but I received it today and tried it out. I have (5) fur babies that shed like there’s no tomorrow! After using this on my babies, I gotta tell you... it’s awesome. It’s easy to use. My babies love being “petted”- little do they know their loose hair is being caught up on the glove. And all you have to do to remove the fur is flick your wrist give a little shake and... tah dah! Poof! Gone! Really.... it’s a great product that works!
customer_reviews.author: Ethel Long

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used similar gloves in the past and it was time for an upgrade. After some research I settled on these. Well, ‘you get what you pay for’ principle clearly does not work here. These look like .99 cent product at best. The rubber smell is very bad and has not disappeared after a couple of days. I would not touch any living creature with these.
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job on both dogs and cats
customer_reviews.text: Originally when I tried it on my dog the hair built up on the glove and it didn't come off that easy and I ended up getting it on myself trying to get the hair off the gloves. I tried it on both my cat and dog. Both didn't seem to mind getting groomed and it did remove a lot of the loose hair. After the first few uses it seems the hair fell off the gloves more easily.
customer_reviews.author: DMac

customer_reviews.title: THESE WORK REALLY WELL!!!
customer_reviews.text: My horses are free to come in and out of their stalls. That being the case, and because they are now shedding their winter coats, they love to roll a lot, seemingly preferring the most muddy spots in the fields. These gloves not only help remove the hair, but because I can FEEL how much pressure I'm using and because the silicone fingers have give, I can easily clean elbows, pasterns, hocks etc., and the horses seem to really enjoy the grooming. Then, the hair comes off the gloves quickly and easily, making them very easy to clean and sanitize.
customer_reviews.author: Denice Baggett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The benefit about this product is that it definitely does remove a lot of hair. The annoying fault of this product is that the hair does not stick well on the glove, so the hair flies all over and around, and on everything, including me and my clothes. When I use a high quality brush, the hair stays right in the teeth of the brush, and does not fly around loose. I won't use this very often because it creates a lot of flying hair everywhere. I think the price is way too high, and only one glove is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Charming

customer_reviews.title: pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my horses legs and they work fantastic. Very hard to brush on and around their boney legs, but these gloves make it so easy. They also work on the dogs, although I did notice quite a bit of static, and so did the dogs. But other than that they are especially handy in odd areas, like ears, lower belly, legs. Would recommend. Don't expect to get the undercoat out of a Husky tho.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl lambert

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever and my cats love it
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES brush time now. The longer pins are very useful for getting the front mane of my part-Maine coon. This has gotten more hair off him than any other type of brush except a detangler brush. My one complaint is that it's hard to get the hair off, but then it's no harder than any other brush. Sizing was perfect, I followed the sizing instructions and determined my hand was a medium.
customer_reviews.author: C. Erie

customer_reviews.title: No more undercoat
customer_reviews.text: Usually my dog spends months blowing coat. We're in Minnesota so his undercoat is extremely thick and then we have really hot summers as well. So late Spring and Fall are full of dog hair everywhere. He loves the massage he gets and I love that I'm not fighting with the Furmenator to release all of the hair. I haven't tried them in the bath yet but for my Irish Setter Goldendoodle mix- his hair is very Golden Retriever like- these gloves are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: mbaker

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these to work. So badly. I thought it would be a great way to love on our cat and clean her up at the same tome. I’ve tried them twice. Each time they were on my hands no more than 1-2 minutes. They simply didn’t remove much of my cat’s hair. By comparison, the regular old pet brush had so much hair on it that I had to stop and clean it out in the same 1-2 minutes of use. Our cat is older & her coat tends to get matted easily, so maybe that’s a factor. Bottom line: these gloves didn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fuqua

customer_reviews.title: Great during a bath, so-so when dry
customer_reviews.text: I have a long haired shar pei/St Bernard mix. Previous reviews were correct when they said these didn’t work as well on dry hair. But I was Impressed with the amount of dirt and hair that came off this dog during his bath. And he loved the petting when he’s usually anxious at bath time. It’s spring so he’s still shedding-these aren’t miracle gloves-but combined with his normal brushings I have noticed a reduction in the hair around the house after a bath. And they make bathing easier on him and me so I’ll take it as a win.
customer_reviews.author: Stephannie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on my short haired cats
customer_reviews.text: More fur came off with my bare hands than with these gloves. My cats are short-haired with slick coats and these "tines" just slide right through. I can only imagine these possibly working on a bushy animal like a maine coon cat or husky dog. These gloves are very "aggressive" and could hurt smaller animals. Also, I have large hands for a woman (I wear a men's size large gloves) so I ordered the x-large.........still too tight. So if you're a man with "large" hands, these won't fit. I ordered Derosen Premium Pet Grooming Deshedding Gloves and they work great on my kitties, and at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: sara jolls

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought these
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time in years that I have had a dog that sheds. I've never had a short-haired dog and I swear the shedding is worse with her. I got these gloves, took Acadia outside and started petting her with them. Every time I stopped for a second to get the hair off, she was jumping on me to continue. This is the best thing for removing fur - and I have the Furminator to brush her. I don't use the brush on her any longer. I will say that my cats don't like the gloves, so I do use the brush on them.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Horses to dogs, great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my horse. I was surprised to see that after I did my regular grooming, I put on the gloves and the gloves did a much better job at getting the loose hair out of his coat. He looked great and he stood so well, I’m sure he like the feel his self. I also have four short haired dogs. Wonderful product on them. You can see the grooming fingers work out unwanted hair. You can also feel lumps or bumps, that you can’t feel with a brush.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia kirsch

customer_reviews.title: These gloves work AMAZINGLY WELL on my cats!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves do an amazing job at removing extraneous hair from my cats! So much hair came off of them outside while petting them with these gloves, and I'm so excited that all of this hair of theirs is outside and not in my house! I cannot recommend these enough. PLUS, all three of my cats really enjoyed being pet with them. This is going to be life changing! Also, I have small hands and got the size Small, and they fit me perfectly. All cat owner friends of mine are getting these for Christmas this year!
customer_reviews.author: kdp.atx

customer_reviews.title: Finally something to help with shedding!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot how believe how well these gloves work for removing hair off of my dog! They should be called magic gloves! I have 2 Dalmatians and they shed constantly. They come running to me when they see me put these in. Almost like a play/petting session. When I finish I shake them and the hair falls off. I groom them outside of course. I honestly never ever expected these to work but I am beyond happy with them. You will never use a brush again once you have these.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: Never buying another brush again
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy another dog brush again. I have a 70 lb husky who doesn't like to sit still when it comes time to brushing him. These gloves just made it into a game for h and it was Soo easy and fast to remove all the unwanted hair that would've just ended up on my living room floor. These were a great buy and I love them already. It was so easy to just shake the hair off, no pulling it out and taking time to clean out a brush, just shake your hands and the hair comes right out.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Works great easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 German shepherd and a couple cats that we can even use these on. The dogs absolutely love it and they get a nice little massage while you get rid of all that loose fur. The fur clumps into the palms of the gloves and removes in just one layer. It's super easy to clean up and we use them all the time. I even brush my cats with them, just with a little less pressure. Works really good though because one of our shepherds sheds like crazy and it will remove all the clumps with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Introduce the gloves to the cat slowly
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are GREAT! my cats love them. I had to introduce the gloves to the cats slowly. I waded the glove up in my hand and petted the cat with the glove rolled up, and they loved it. Then I used the glove with my hand on the outside of the glove and petted the cats. Then I put one glove on until the cats liked it, then both gloves. I did this over the course of about an hour, and now the cats get very excited when they see the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Used On Great Dane
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try and keep my Great Dane from shedding so much inside the house. It works wonders. I use it on my pup for a bout two/three minutes every day and it has really limited the amount of hair found inside my house. It also has help disperse her bodies natural skin and hair oils and have made her shinier.
customer_reviews.author: Warner Parkes

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the ad hype
customer_reviews.text: Using these gloves on two adult dogs that shed in clumps that need constantly swept up, not to mention the constant vent cleaning and filter changes in the air system. We have a brush that not only doesn't get into the undercoat during summer, but also, one of our dogs hates the brush. However, putting the gloves on, and doing a regular petting, gets giant yet manageable clumps of hair out making everyone happy! Def worth the $ and lived up to the ad hype.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: HandsOn Pet Grooming Gloves fit & work well!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only just tried these today for the first time after they were delivered. My Pyrenees/English Golden Mix absolutely LOVES this new grooming method! He didn’t want to stop! I measured my hand prior to ordering to assure a good fit. They fit my hands very well! My hands were sweating by the time we were done trying these out for the first time. So far we are well pleased. We’ll see how they hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sealey

customer_reviews.title: Golden Retreivers
customer_reviews.text: To all you golden lovers out there these are pretty solid. I wish I could give it 4.5, because they don't get into the undercoat. BUT, they work on the loose hair, they are comfy, and easy to clean. I can see how these will be a huge benefit when washing them. the only issue I have is my girl is addicted to gloves and she wants to bit them off of me when I use them on her, but when I get her to hold still they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Ttsnuffy

customer_reviews.title: I really like these HandsOn Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I really like these HandsOn Gloves, however, am disappointed in the sizing! I went on their website measured my hand as directed, ordered a medium which according to the measurments would fit my hands. Well, not true. The gloves I received were extremely small and with much forcing was able to get on at least one hand. I should have ordered a large or maybe an extra large. The reason for the 5 stars? After trying so hard to get my hands in the gloves, washed my horse with floating glove fingers and palm was pleased with how easy it removes dirt and loose hair. My horse loved the being scratched in his "itchy" spot.
customer_reviews.author: Nance

customer_reviews.title: Nice to be able to buy a small size!
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I really like about these gloves is that you can buy these in different sizes so I was able to buy a small that fits my hands really well. What I don’t like about it is that the hair really does not stick to the glove the way it did with my old pair. When you brush the dog the hair just sort of flies off into the wind. It might just be because I am dealing with two shorthair dogs. If your dog has longer hair this may not be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: 5/24/20- I used these gloves today to bathe my Rottweiler. She enjoyed her bath and could tell something was different. These gloves were terrific! Kaya sheds a lot, and to see all of her excess hair removed, it gave me a great feeling. I gave "Easy to Clean" a 4 star because I had to run the water over my hands in order to remove the hair from my gloves. . I ran out of hands while holding the leash and the hose. Nonetheless, this is worth your money!
customer_reviews.author: Emmalei

customer_reviews.title: Horrible gloves
customer_reviews.text: They do kinda work, but not well. The hair that they get off gets stuck in-between them and is a pain to remove. Also I have a white dog and after every time using these gloves I found little black peices of rubber stuck in her hair. Its a nonstarter for me. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Rog

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are really nice. I like that I can groom and handle horses without having to hold a grooming tool. Super great at bath time too. My only gripe is that they take ages to dry which worries me that they'll grow mildew or something on them. Also the rubbery plastic has cracked after just a couple uses. It's not peeling off so it seems okay. I also love that they come in different sizes. I have really small hands so it's nice that I can finally use something that fits my hand instead of those giant brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Judge

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves, great fit, great deshedding tool.
customer_reviews.text: Got the XL expecting the usual, slightly too small for me. I am a big guy at 6'4" and usually have a hard time getting gloves of any sort that fit outside nylon/rubber gloves. These fit me perfect. Super happy about that. My dog wasn't sure what to think but seemed to really enjoy the deshedding he got from just half a minutes worth of a quick test before I had to go to bed. He didn't shy away or try to run, so it wins in that category, any brush I've tried always has that result. Will buy again and do recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loved these gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are a godsend. My baby was shedding Soo badly. The first time I used them on her I had a pile of hair. She's a pittie mix so she had supper short hair. It didn't stick in the gives at all and my girl loves me to pet her with them. When I pick them up she gets so excited because they feel so good
customer_reviews.author: Danielle W.

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: I have a German Shepherd mutt who goes CRAZY when she sees me pick these up. She runs outside, waits for me to sit down on the grass, and then parks her butt in my lap. The gloves fit true to the size chart, are very comfortable, and allow me to vary pressure on the more sensitive parts of her body while still "scrubbing." My one concern is that the dip coating on the nubs started to peel off on the first use, but that coating doesn't seem to be integral to its structure. I use them at least 3x a week with all the strength I can muster, and they are still going strong! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: betz

customer_reviews.title: Better for larger animals
customer_reviews.text: I got these gloves for my cat because she hates for me to brush her. First off, these have a strong odor when taken out of the package. I let my cats sniff them and they didn't seem to mind. Unfortunately, my larger cat, the anti-brush one, doesn't like the glove, either. I noticed it didn't take that much fur off when I stroked her with it a few times. The nubs are too far apart. Back to the drawing board!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more happy
customer_reviews.text: Man...these gloves are legit. I have a 12 yr old boxer who sheds here and there; due to COVID he's in the house more. So I needed something to keep the situation under control. Big fan of how much hair these remove with very little effort. When I'm done I just run them thru water which makes it easy to clean (huge advantage over similar products I've had in the past.) Finally the size is perfect; snag am extra XL if you're over 6ft and have big hands.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: My Boxer LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: My Boxer dog absolutely loves these gloves. He has allergies and has itchy skin despite Cytopoint and Apoquel. These gloves must feel amazing because he literally zones out when I pet him while wearing them. Hair doesn't stick to them like I kind of expected it to so I used them outside the first time because the fur was just flying off. Very well constructed, and size small fit my small hands perfectly. I'd buy these again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Blame It On Karma

customer_reviews.title: Great for brushing the dog
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit nicely and work like a charm. They do not hold the fur, but loosen it so it falls off. It is like a fur snow storm when I brush my pit bull with these gloves, so I have to do it outside. These gloves reduce the amount of shedding in the house significantly because they remove loose fur so well. Need to brush both with and against the grain of the fur for them to work best. My dog loves the rub down he gets when I am brushing him down. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Hopfer

customer_reviews.title: Unlike most folks who said their pets LOVE them using these I found my dog would tolerate ...
customer_reviews.text: Well.....Unlike most folks who said their pets LOVE them using these I found my dog would tolerate it for a few minutes at best before he pulled away. He is a fairly long haired Aussie BTW. But......that is wayyyyy better than his reaction even to the most careful use of a brush or comb. And I did get a moan of pleasure from him when I used these to gently rub around his ears and under his chin. Hopefully he permits longer and longer use of them, but at least he doesn't go zipping away like he does when he sees the brush. So....based on that I give them high marks. Hair cleans off them easily as well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Somers

customer_reviews.title: Ladies Small Gloves are da bomb.com!
customer_reviews.text: We love them! 4 paws 🐾 up! I have small hands, small wrists and these fit me perfect! She’s getting older, more fussy, and she wants to be brushed for “just so long”. Theses gloves started out with purrs and ended with purrs. I was able to reach those tough spots on her back for her. She’s not walking around looking like Pigpen from Peanuts anymore. Lol. Pics show the truth & she’s happier too. 😻
customer_reviews.author: CluelssCat

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality
customer_reviews.text: Superior quality. From the materials used to the construction, these gloves are excellent. I tried ordering a pair that was less expensive, but you definitely get what you pay for. Do not even try to spend less than this and expect quality. I hope and expect these to last for a long time. I am currently using them on my Cavapoo puppy and my very long haired Maine coon cat. The gloves do a great job
customer_reviews.author: Sara S

customer_reviews.title: HandsOn Pet Grooming Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these grooming gloves!! It took 3 or 4 times to get all the hair the first go round because she was shedding so bad. Now I use them once a day to keep it under control. It wasn't just a shake to get the hair off of the gloves but it starts to come off and then I gently pull down to remove it the rest of the way. Will have to try it with wet hair and see if that shakes off better. Still love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Elder

customer_reviews.title: The Best Relief for Excessive Shedding
customer_reviews.text: If you have a pet that sheds a lot, these are the perfect way to drastically reduce it. I have a husky mix and her blowout was incredible. She was losing an extra dog a day. These gloves made it almost non-existent. I brush her during her morning walk and then again during her evening walk. There is barely any fur around my house anymore. Her shedding killed my Roomba and shark. It has been manageable since I got these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Use the size chart to measure before ordering. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: These really work. We have 2 small dogs, cocker mix and a dachshund mix. I can't believe how much hair came off of them. Definitely recommend using them outside. It took a few tries, but I figured out how to flick my wrists to release the hair, but somehow the hair clumps up and then flings off. Haven't tried them in the bath yet. Make sure to use the size chart. I should have ordered Large instead of Medium. A little tight for my hands. Not sure how long they will last as I just received them today.
customer_reviews.author: PaulDeCarlo

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes it.
customer_reviews.text: We rescued a now 20 month old Corgi mix who was badly treated by his former owners and was afraid of most things. He really hated and feared being brushed. So i went on Amazon and found Hands on pet grooming gloves. with a lot of encouragement and a few treats, he now lets us use the gloves. the fur flies off, his coat shines and he gets gentle message ( which he loves). The gloves clean very easy by just rubbing them together the residue hair just comes off and the gloves are clean. Haven't washed them yet but don't anticipate any trouble, Thanks for a great product. Mike
customer_reviews.author: Mike Magno

customer_reviews.title: They work great!!!  They are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We just received these gloves so I tried them out. Wow! They work great and our fur baby loved them. He just laid right down and enjoyed the massage. I was amazed at "ALL" the hair that came off of him. In less than 5 minutes I had a pile of hair all around him that came off. All I did was shake the gloves and the hair came right off. If you have a big dog that sheds these are great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Kunstman

customer_reviews.title: That these gloves work
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair for my daughter she has two shedding dogs, she says Awesome!!! She said a person could knit a sweater with all the fur removed. I used mine on my 10 year old who doesn't like to be brushed, but with the gloves she got a rub down too. She thought that was really nice. Cleaning the gloves is easier when dry, otherwise just hose off and done.
customer_reviews.author: Rita K

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: After trying a number of different shedding/brushing gloves and having them all fail I wasn't going get my hopes up with these. I'm happy they work great. My dog loves them and it makes it easier to get in the area around her hips. She also likes the gloves better than the brush I had been using on her sides. You definitely should use it outside unless you want to have hair everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW WOW WOW
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat with a coat so thick not even the furminator can remove her undercoat. Plus she hates that thing and I have to hold her down to really remove her fur because she constantly sheds. I thought I'd try these out as a kitty massage treat never expecting 1) my cat would love it, 2) I was able to get more fur from her than the furminator ever removed, 3) it peels right off the glove and goes right into the trash and 4) because I don't have to fight her to actually brush her, her shedding has almost stopped. Had I known earlier how good these are, I'd have purchased them years ago!
customer_reviews.author: D3003

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Best.Dog.Brush.EVER!!! I have a husky, a terrier and a pit. My dogs LOVE these gloves, they know where they are and beg for them. My husky actually hates all brushes but loves these gloves. I use them on my back porch and CLOUDS of dog hair waft into the air. All I can think is how grateful I am that it's not in my house. These help with dandruff too and leave a nice shiney coat. Very good product, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Louise Parker

customer_reviews.title: Every pet parent should get these!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome!!!! Really wish I had gotten them a lot soon.worked so well in my schipperke Arwyne. For a Furminator and a shed tool neither worked well for her. These got the undercoat made it soft and she is so much cooler now. For a half 13 gallon talk yeah bag off her. So glad works extremely well for bathing too. Please try them your gut baby and you will love them.
customer_reviews.author: java bean addict

customer_reviews.title: Ok for dogs with short hair
customer_reviews.text: I got these to help my 5 month old pug get rid of his shedded hair. I got them 1 day latter than expected but I was notified about the delay. They worked great for us, fit as expected and they’re comfortable. They are resistant too as I got him chewing on one while brushing with the other, again this is a puppy. After his first grooming session he looks shiny and even smells better. I would recommend this for dogs with short hair.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Herndon

customer_reviews.title: Cats didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: The cats didn't like it, they just kept running away. It does ok when I could brush them but a brush or comb still works better (judged by how much hair I get after 2 passes). Maybe they work better in the bath while lathering, I don't think I'll be able to test that theory on cats. Fit and quality is alright but ultimately not as useful for us as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Julia L.

customer_reviews.title: Best shedding tool yet!
customer_reviews.text: I've used every shedding tool out there for my yak of a horse, and this is by far the most effective and fastest way to get the hair and dirt off. I used these to give him a bath, much easier than a curry to get him good and clean . Then I used them on the barn dog, got his fuzzies out and he appreciated the massage. I use these first when grooming now, instead of a curry. Much faster, and easy on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Romewhip

customer_reviews.title: Black rubber pieces stuck all over our kitty's fur and the smell was horrendous!
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to receive this item as our Siberian Forest Cat is going through his bi-yearly shedding season. The first brush of the glove over our cat left little black rubber pieces all over his beautiful orange/white fur. And the smell off the glove was left on our kitty. This item is a complete piece of garbage. We returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: slbon

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used other gloves that profess to de-shed your dog, but this is the best ever! I have a part corgi, who sheds a lot. He loves to sit and let me used this glove on him. While it does an excellent job going through his thick fur, he enjoys the attention! It is hassle free! I also has a pug who sheds 12 months a year, but his hair is not as thick. He enjoys the brushing, but it is not as effective on him. It definitely helps with the pug, but it is amazing with the corgi!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Game changer. Two German shepherds make for a lot of shedding. Our new pups HATES to be brushed and only likes light petting. But she adored this glove brushing. Didn’t struggle to leave and after I released her kept coming back for more. The gloves removed a TON of fur. Easy to use and the shed fur comes right off the gloves. I cloaked my hands together and few times and they were clean. Sizing chart is accurate. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: K. P.

customer_reviews.title: The gloves work great, but here is a helpful suggestion.
customer_reviews.text: I used the gloves on my medium length hair cat and they worked great. This is my 3rd day of using them and I get a big ball of undercoat off her every day, and the best part is that my cat loves it. My suggestion to new users would be to only use one glove at a time. That way you have one bare hand to remove the hair from the gloved hand. With two gloves on, you will find that setting the hair aside that you have brushed off, is almost impossible.
customer_reviews.author: leo jacobin

customer_reviews.title: Best deshedding tool I've found
customer_reviews.text: Every now and then, I order something on Amazon that is really a great product. Sometimes, I waste a lot of money. But today, I received something I thought I should share for any pet owner. All my life, I have used rakes, brushes, 'hack-saw' blades, etc to remove hair from shedding pets. Results have always been limited and the task always became a chore, sometimes leading to bites, claw scratches and blood. All that is OVER. :) I saw this on some Vet show on Animal Planet and bought it from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Zink

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. I have a Shepard Husky mix with a thick double coat who sheds like crazy. These gloves pulled that extra hair right off. She loved it and stood nice and still even waiting while I cleaned off the gloves. Usually she will dash away at the 1st opportunity if she is not enjoying the grooming. I fully recommend..worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mz T

customer_reviews.title: A Product that works as Promised
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best product we have used to remove lose dog hair. My wife just loves this product, its simple and effective. We have a 155lb French Mastiff and a 21lb French Bulldog and they both love being brushed with these gloves. Our Frenchie would never sit still for a brushing but after the first pass she sat right down. Now when she shes my wife get the gloves out she comes to her and does a dance as only a Frenchie can. Awesome product I will be ordering a second pair so we can do both dogs at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Skinny Pup!
customer_reviews.text: I have a year old terrier mix who is very slim. Any dog grooming item I have from other dogs is too rough for him and knocks his bones. These gloves are wonderful! I got the small size according to the size chart and they fit well. A few rubs with the gloves removed loose hair and my dog LOVED it! I was able to reach difficult to get areas like his legs and tail. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Grooming Product Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially hesitated to purchase these because of the price but I have NO regrets whatsoever. They have been wonderful for bathing - getting way down into thick dog hair, removing excess hair from undercoats AND the dogs LOVE it when they get groomed!! There are other products out there that may be less expensive but these are truly quality. The wristband strap is especially helpful as I don't have to worry about them slipping off while bathing the dogs. Definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: lisaone

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!  Have pets that shed, get these!
customer_reviews.text: WOW these are great! I hate hate hate pet hair and now we have 3 cats. Ive purchased mits, brushes and other hair tools and these are it. They work great and the cats love being “pet” by them. I could only imagine how great they would work on dogs with longer hair. I totally suggest ordering these and trying them out if you deal with pet hair!
customer_reviews.author: Elicia Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Good small US company
customer_reviews.text: My 2 cats and dog love it when I use these and they work very well. They stay as long as I want to brush them. One of my cats doesn't purr often, but he starts right away when it's time for "brush brush". I looked for a long time for gloves made in the USA and I'm sure glad I found them. They answer questions quickly and thoroughly. Thanks, guys!
customer_reviews.author: marinermama

customer_reviews.title: Cat actually likes to be groomed now.
customer_reviews.text: My cat hates being brushed but sheds like crazy, we were at a stalemate for a long time then i found this product. I figured i had nothing to lose so i bought them. They're very comfortable to maneuver and stay in place. Haven’t tried to bathe with them yet but my cat was successfully tricked into thinking he was being petted and thats all i care about.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Steward

customer_reviews.title: Best grooming gloves ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best gloves hands down. No pun intended. I’m a groomer and these get me excited because the quality is so much above the others. Very nice fit and comfy. All my smooth coated clients love the massage action. The bliss on their faces would be a good selling point. And these gloves really get the dead undercoat way better than furminator. WAY better. And it’s not abrasive like furminator can be. I rarely use my furminator anymore. Buy these you’ll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Elder

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These gently remove the loose fur without pulling uncomfortably on the rest. My newer rescue mini donkeys sometimes get nervous when approached carrying things in my hands (for example, our old large brush) but are much more comfortable when I approach "empty handed" wearing these gloves and simply act like I'm giving them pets. These work well removing the extra floof on my german shepherd too. The gloves fit great and the velcro ensure they won't slip off. My only complaint is that initially they smelled very much like vinegar, but after a few uses and rinses afterward the smell has gone away.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! These gloves are amazing!!! They really do what they say they will. The fur just kept coming off of my cats and then I’d just peel the fur off the gloves. The cats loved it, they were getting affection and sat there while I was doing it. I’m just so shocked at how great they worked. I’m thinking of buying another pair to keep as a spare. Love love love them!
customer_reviews.author: Torrie Jessee

customer_reviews.title: great for short haired dogs!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are exactly what I was looking for. I haven't used them during bath time yet but they pull the hair off my short haired chihuahua and he really seems to like the feel of them. Only downside I've noticed so far is that they smell horrible when you first get them. I'm hoping that smell fades over time but thats my only complaint so far!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W

customer_reviews.title: My cats love being brushed with these
customer_reviews.text: My cats usually don't stay in one place long enough to be thoroughly brushed; but when I break these out and put them on, my cats come running and it's usually a competition to see who gets brushed the longest. They don't snag or pull, and the hair is easy to remove from the gloves once it's built up. I have small hands and my husband has large hands, so I ordered the medium thinking they could stretch. Well, they fit him perfectly and are only a little large on me. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Incredible find
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats and 2 dogs and they all love being “petted” with these gloves. It’s especially important for my short haired cat who gets terrible knots. She’s always hated grooming in the past. And the fur easily comes off these gloves. I’m about to buy a second pair so we can have one set upstairs and one on our main floor.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Kelly

customer_reviews.title: best grooming tool ever
customer_reviews.text: Love these grooming gloves and my horse loves them too! I can really get into all the curves and delicate places with these gloves that I cannot really brush with curry comb or dandy brush. I can massage my horse and scratch him and he seems to really enjoy being groomed! Even better is the love of God described in John 3:16--read it today for encouragement!
customer_reviews.author: Prayer Warrior

customer_reviews.title: A must have for dogs with a medium to thick coat!!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are amazing! I have a German Shepherd Great Dane mix and his fur undercoat I thought was going to be overwhelming. However using these gloves regularly, in lieu of a brush, has smoothed out his coat, removing a lot of that loose hair that flies around. With the clap of my hands the gloves are clean! Easy peasy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HandsOn Pet Grooming Glove
customer_reviews.text: UPS delivered yesterday, I immediately opened package, put the Gloves on, located my cat "Fuzz Ball", gave him a full body comb and it actually worked exactly the way the TV ad said it would. Both my cat and I are surprised and happy. Hair stays on the glove until, gently removed in one piece. One of my better purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Judith R Bodily

customer_reviews.title: Great grooming gloves
customer_reviews.text: I have three rather large, longhaired Newfoundlands. The dogs absolutely love their daily rubdown with these gloves. (Actually they enjoy any rubdown.) The gloves loosen and remove some of the dense undercoat. The gloves seem to provide a little more joy to the dog. My dogs push and shove to be the lucky dog I would highly recommend these gloves, as would my dogs. (I wish there was a glove set for denser coated dogs, but these were the best I could find.)
customer_reviews.author: Apple

customer_reviews.title: So happy
customer_reviews.text: I have a 120 pound Belgium Malinois American Bulldog mix (Malibull) who sheds enough to knit a scarf every day. I used this on him for the first time today. He LOVES the hands on and the fur that comes off!!! He absolutely loves it. I also have a diva, a 10 pound white toy poodle, i didn't think she would be impressed at all, but wow, she didn't want me to stop. Works EXACTLY as advertised. Best dog grooming tool ever. So satisfied. Getting for all my family with pets.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: More promise than return
customer_reviews.text: These gloves showed way more promise than what actually occured... These nubs are hard as hell and my cats do not like it al all! It doesnt seem pleasurable to them and my maincoon , who sheds quite a bit, seems to have no de shedding effect. Overall disappointing but I'm sure large animals would love these
customer_reviews.author: Tryer and DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Horse loves!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use on my horse. I gave 4 star cause I'm not sure they work any better than a brush. They worked for me as advertised. I have to say my horse LOVES them!!! Like giving her a massage. Bonus she doesn't really like her head or around her ears brushed with a brush but loves these!!! She'll bug me to do more. I'm a 7 & the small fit perfect. For the fact they work & my horse loves, I'd buy again. Very fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I can't explain how worth it these gloves are! I groom on the side plus my pets and I've tried many gloves out. Finally bit the bullet and bought these. So glad I did. They work very well (on my short hair dog and long cat), durable, and can even tighten properly around my small wrist. My pets love it
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: My horse loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this pair as a gift for a friend--I bought my first pair at a horse expo. My horse loves them! After a ride, they are a great way to give him a good rub in all the "hard to scratch" places. They also help remove loose hair and bring the oils to the surface. I used them on the barn cat, and she loved them, too. The "nubbies" are placed just right so you can use your whole hand to rub. Such a great way to bond with your buddy!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but stiching ripped
customer_reviews.text: nice gloves. work ok. You need to really build up a mat of hair before it peels off quick and easy otherwise you got straggly little hairs flying everywhere. What I didn't like, and its really disappointing is the velcro strap stitching ripped super easy. its as if the stitching wasn't completed all the way around and now is coming undone. I am contemplating returning as I have no stitching skills and I am not paying someone to stitch it for me. At ~$25 I expect a quality finished product. I'd expect it would rip eventually from wear and tear but right off the bat is something cheap $10 gloves would do; very disappointing here.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: My German Shepherd Loves these Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and was packaged well. I ordered the medium gloves, which fit me great but are a little tight for my husband. Put them on, let our pup smell them for a minutes, then started petting her. She loved it so much she climbed into my lap and went to sleep. This is great for a pup that usually dances around while I try to brush her. These gloves removed so much "dead" hair that I could have made a small sweater! I highly recommend these gloves as the number grooming tool in your floofer arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.  Poorly manufactured.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product! I have arthritis in my hands and was thrilled to find a grooming product that was easy and effective. I can groom and not have painful hands when I'm done! The gloves worked well on my mare. But...after less than 30 days three of the finger pads fell off. This wasn't crazy heavy use -- I groom my girl three to four times a week for 5 to 10 minutes. I expected these to last longer. I doubt that I'll purchase a replacement pair, so once all the finger pads fall off it's back to curry combs and painful hands. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Hannahs Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best glooming item ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: With 2 dogs that shed sooooooo much these gloves have cut down on the hair tremendously. I bath my dogs and brush my dogs with these gloves outside and it really helps keep the hair down inside. Note. If you bathe them with the gloves it will loosen hair, which will shed once they dry. Dry them outside and brush them really well before they come inside.
customer_reviews.author: UDontKnowMe

customer_reviews.title: Better than a brush!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs think being brushed is a game and turn it into a game of chase the puppy. With these gloves I can actually brush my dogs and get their under coat brushed out and they think they are just getting extra special lovings. Also an added benefit if you have cloth furniture you can use this glove to get the fur off it! Cannot wait to use them next time the dogs get a bath! These gloves grab excess fur it's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: These are very useful
customer_reviews.text: I really liked using these gloves and my dog loved me using the gloves. They do remove a ton of hair! I usually clap my hands together to remove the hair from the glove. It use to be a chore to brush the dog but now it is easy and since he loves it so much he doesn't want me to stop.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried combs, brushes, and grooming gloves on my cat. He has a fluffy bunny like undercoat and he doesn't like to be messed with. But these gloves get that fluff out of there in just a minute or two, and he actually purred. And the hair just came right off the gloves when I shook my hands over the trash can. The dog loved it too but he loves everything.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Lucas

customer_reviews.title: THESE REALLY WORK!
customer_reviews.text: OUR CAT WILL NEVER RUN OUT OF HAIR TO BRUSH, BUT THESE GLOVES GET MORE HAIR FASTER & EASIER WITH LESS RESISTANCE THAN ANY BRUSH OR APPARATUS WE'VE EVER USED. WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND. THEY'RE COMFORTABLE FOR THE OPERATOR, AND EASY ON THE CAT'S PSYCHE! CLEAN UP IS EASY, GLOVES FIT WELL.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rousselle

customer_reviews.title: Sharp hard nubs hurt my pup
customer_reviews.text: The reviews enticed me to buy this for my chi mix shedding machine. When I tried to brush my dog with them on he yelled out in pain 2 times. The nubs on the fingers are too long and too hard and too sharp for a short hair shedding dog. I will have to return them because no matter how lightly I brush, it hurts my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Works great on cat!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves really worked on our cat! This cat hated to be brushed and would attack anytime we came close to him with a brush or comb. I can't say he loves being groomed with the Handson gloves, but he tolerates it well and I hope he will eventually begin to enjoy it. Most important, mounds of hair came off of his coat and fewer hairballs are being spit up. This was definitely a worthwhile purchase for us.
customer_reviews.author: Denise R.

customer_reviews.title: Help to loosen hair
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs shed a ton, so I'm hoping these gloves help to loosen hair when bathing. I use in addition to deshedding shampoo and conditioner things are slightly better. I can't say that my dogs like them but they tolerate them. They gloves definitely get the suds going.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Gertrude

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love It, Removes Hair, Difficult to Clean
customer_reviews.text: My cats love being pet by it and you can tell they're made well. They remove hair well too. But those shots in the video ads where the hair just peels off in one thatched sheet--have never had that happen. The hair is a bit difficult to get off the glove without sitting there and pinching it out little by little. Maybe that's because my cats are shorthairs. I'm not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Farvel Newvan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for removing loose shedding hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Great Dane, normal bristle brushes don't seem to do the job. These gloves are amazing, the hair that came off my dog was a good amount and all I did was just brushed him with my hands with the gloves on. Its so much easier cause the gloves allow you to run you hands down and around your dogs body and you do not have to hang onto any brushes. I have been looking for something like this since I got my dog. Best thing ever!
customer_reviews.author: cher rudolph

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my horse, donkey, and dogs. You really only have to shake your hands and the hair falls off. Great quality great price. The animals love the massage they get as well. I bought a small and they fit perfectly. I usually buy a women’s small to Medium glove.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 4 cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love how they are real gloves, means they stay on your hands. So far 3 out of 4 cats love it. My little girl Freya absolutely loves it because she can attack the hand (no, we don't approve, but we got her like this) that brushes her. Sturdy, well made, easy to remove the collected for, and i get to have purple hands.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Effective but messy. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Its gets a lot of loose hair off of my dog, a chihuahua mix. He gets super hyper when I use them but mostly seems to like it. The only downside for me is that his hair doesn't stick to the gloves, it all falls on the floor. So I make sure to do it outside or on a towel. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JoannaJ

customer_reviews.title: Meant for longer hair pet? Or defective
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like it. My cat actually enjoys being groomed with it but this thing does not hold the fur to the glove, causes static, and fur goes everywhere in the air and I breathe it in...I have allergies so it’s no good. Maybe will work better at sticking fur to the gloves for longer hair pets....org I got a defective one? I’ll just stick to brush
customer_reviews.author: Chill

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for user and dog and VERY effective
customer_reviews.text: I have a timid pitbull who is afraid of a standard grooming brush so brushing her was impossible. I wore these gloves around the house, played with her and fed her with them on and she did not cowar when I finally tried to groom her. To my surprise, she not only accepted them, she loves the attention she gets when I use them on her. Even though she is a short haired breed, the amount of loose hair I was able to remove from her was jaw dropping! We use these every day, sometimes twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grooming and bathing gloves for horses
customer_reviews.text: I have these and bought same for 2 friends as gifts Tbey work great for my horses. I mean great for grooming and bathing ...can’t live without them I have a long hair dog and they are not good for him but I would imagine as with a horse short haired dogs ... probably great !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: HandsOn Pet Grooming Gloves - Patented #1 Ranked, Award Winning Shedding, Bathing, & Hair Remover Gloves - Gentle Brush for Cats, Dogs, and Horses
feature_bullets: GENTLY GROOM, SHED, BATHE, & MASSAGE PETS - HandsOn's five-finger design, complete with bristle tips on the fingers and round tips on the palm, allow for a versatile expert tool capable of grooming, de-shedding, bathing, or massaging your animal. This pair of gloves gently removes excess hair, debris, and tangles while keeping your hands and finger nails clean from dirt and oil.

NON-ABRASIVE, FLEXIBLE RUBBER NODULES - Groom and shed your animal without hurting their skin! Non-abrasive, flexible rubber nodules gently massage your pet and remove excess hair while distributing natural oils for a healthy skin and coat.

BIG OR SMALL PETS / LONG OR SHORT HAIR - Whether you are grooming a horse, chihuahua, or calico cat, rest assured that HandsOn has you covered. Our patented design works on all animals, big or small, long or short hair!

PETS LOVE IT - Make bathing, grooming, and cleaning an enjoyable experience for both you and your pet! Pets shouldn't fear bath time and neither should you. This pair of grooming gloves make hard-to-reach places easy and quick to clean. Wet or dry, these gloves will not slip or fall off thanks to the hook and loop fastener.

EASY TO CLEAN - Simply rub your gloved hands together, rinse off with water and air dry, or throw them in the washing machine for quick and easy cleaning. These gloves are also compact enough to fit comfortably in your pocket, grooming caddy, or bag.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
